title: Journey to Housing Stability
subtitle: How WFD supports clients through each milestone

sections.heading: Intake & Trust
sections.body: We begin by listening and building trust. Intake establishes goals, risks, and immediate needs so services are personalized from day one.

sections.heading: Training & Support
sections.body: Clients receive tailored training, documentation help, and wraparound support. Quick wins build confidence and momentum.

sections.heading: Housing & Follow-up
sections.body: We celebrate move-ins and track stability over time, ensuring clients have the resources and community connections to thrive.
